languages.text: "Вы вторглись на закрытую станцию и убили одного из ее хранителей! Пусть Фелек и был предателем, он также был {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатором{/g} из семьи Орселлио. А теперь... вы пытаетесь угрожать и мне?" {n}Старик недоверчиво склоняет голову.{/n} "Покуда мне неизвестны ваше имя и намерения, я не перестану считать вас угрозой. И дрожать пред вами тоже не собираюсь".

traits.locale_text: "Вы вторглись на закрытую станцию и убили одного из ее хранителей! Пусть Фелек и был предателем, он также был {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Навигатором{/g} из семьи Орселлио. А теперь... вы пытаетесь угрожать и мне?" {n}Старик недоверчиво склоняет голову.{/n} "Покуда мне неизвестны ваше имя и намерения, я не перестану считать вас угрозой. И дрожать пред вами тоже не собираюсь".

languages.text: "You forced your way onto a closed station and slew one of its Keepers! Felek may have been a traitor, but he was also a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} of House Orsellio. And now you are attempting to threaten me as well?" {n}The old man tilts his head, looking at you mistrustfully.{/n} "While your name and intentions remain unknown to me, I will continue to view you as a threat. And I will not tremble in fear before you either."
languages.original_text: "Вы вторглись на закрытую станцию и убили одного из ее хранителей! Пусть Фелек и был предателем, он также был {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатором{/g} из семьи Орселлио. А теперь... вы пытаетесь угрожать и мне?" {n}Старик недоверчиво склоняет голову.{/n} "Покуда мне неизвестны ваше имя и намерения, я не перестану считать вас угрозой. И дрожать пред вами тоже не собираюсь".

And now you are attempting to threaten me as well?" {n}The old man tilts his head, looking at you mistrustfully.{/n} "While your name and intentions remain unknown to me, I will continue to view you as a threat. And I will not tremble in fear before you either."

And now you are attempting to threaten me as well?" {n}The old man tilts his head, looking at you mistrustfully.{/n} "While your name and intentions remain unknown to me, I will continue to view you as a threat. And I will not tremble in fear before you either."

And now you are attempting to threaten me as well?" {n}The old man tilts his head, looking at you mistrustfully.{/n} "While your name and intentions remain unknown to me, I will continue to view you as a threat. And I will not tremble in fear before you either."

"You forced your way onto a closed station and slew one of its keepers! Felek may have been a traitor, but he was also a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} of House Orsellio. And now you are attempting to threaten me as well?" {n}The old man tilts his head, looking at you mistrustfully.{/n} "While your name and intentions remain unknown to me, I will continue to view you as a threat. And I will not tremble in fear before you either."

languages.text: “你强行闯入了私人舰站，还杀死了它的守护者！或许费雷克确实是个叛徒，但他依然是奥赛罗家族的{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}。而现在，你还打算威胁我吗？”{n}老人歪着头，以怀疑的眼神看着你。{/n}“虽然我并不清楚你的名字与意图，但我依然会把你视为威胁。别以为我会在你面前吓得瑟瑟发抖。”
languages.original_text: "You forced your way onto a closed station and slew one of its Keepers! Felek may have been a traitor, but he was also a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} of House Orsellio. And now you are attempting to threaten me as well?" {n}The old man tilts his head, looking at you mistrustfully.{/n} "While your name and intentions remain unknown to me, I will continue to view you as a threat. And I will not tremble in fear before you either."

traits.locale_text: “你强行闯入了私人舰站，还杀死了它的守护者！或许费雷克确实是个叛徒，但他依然是奥塞罗家族的{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}。而现在，你还打算威胁我吗？”{n}老人歪着头，以怀疑的眼神看着你。{/n}“虽然我并不清楚你的名字与意图，但我依然会把你视为威胁。别以为我会在你面前吓得瑟瑟发抖。”

languages.text: «¡Se ha infiltrado por la fuerza en una estación cerrada y ha matado a uno de sus guardianes! Felek era un traidor, pero también era un {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g} de la casa Orsellio. ¿Y ahora pretende amenazarme a mí también?». {n}El anciano ladea la cabeza y te mira con desconfianza.{/n} «Aunque desconozco su nombre y sus intenciones, seguiré tratándo{mf|le|la} como una amenaza. Y tampoco tengo intención de temblar de miedo ante usted».
languages.original_text: "You forced your way onto a closed station and slew one of its Keepers! Felek may have been a traitor, but he was also a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} of House Orsellio. And now you are attempting to threaten me as well?" {n}The old man tilts his head, looking at you mistrustfully.{/n} "While your name and intentions remain unknown to me, I will continue to view you as a threat. And I will not tremble in fear before you either."

traits.locale_text: «¡Se ha infiltrado por la fuerza en una estación cerrada y ha matado a uno de sus guardianes! Felek era un traidor, pero también era un {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g} de la casa Orsellio. ¿Y ahora pretende amenazarme a mí también?». {n}El anciano ladea la cabeza y te mira con desconfianza.{/n} «Aunque desconozco su nombre y sus intenciones, seguiré tratándo{mf|le|la} como una amenaza. Y tampoco tengo intención de temblar de miedo ante usted».

languages.text: 「あなたは閉鎖されたステーションに無理やり押し入り、その番人の1人を殺害したのだ！フェレックは裏切り者だったかもしれないが、オーセリオ家の{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}でもあった。そして今、あなたも私を脅そうとしているというのか？」{n}老人は首を傾げ、不信げにあなたを見ている。{/n}あなたの名前も意図も私にはわからないが、私はあなたを脅威と見なし続ける。その眼前で恐怖に震えることもない」
languages.original_text: "You forced your way onto a closed station and slew one of its Keepers! Felek may have been a traitor, but he was also a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} of House Orsellio. And now you are attempting to threaten me as well?" {n}The old man tilts his head, looking at you mistrustfully.{/n} "While your name and intentions remain unknown to me, I will continue to view you as a threat. And I will not tremble in fear before you either."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは閉鎖されたステーションに無理やり押し入り、その番人の1人を殺害したのだ！フェレックは裏切り者だったかもしれないが、オーセリオ家の{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}でもあった。そして今、あなたも私を脅そうとしているというのか？」{n}老人は首を傾げ、不信げにあなたを見ている。{/n}あなたの名前も意図も私にはわからないが、私はあなたを脅威と見なし続ける。その眼前で恐怖に震えることもない」

languages.text: "Ihr seid in eine geschlossene Station eingedrungen und habt einen ihrer Hüter getötet! Felek mag ein Verräter gewesen sein, aber er war auch ein {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} des Hauses Orsellio. Und nun wollt Ihr auch noch mich bedrohen?" {n}Der alte Mann legt den Kopf schief und blickt dich misstrauisch an.{/n} "Euer Name und Eure Absichten sind mir noch immer unbekannt, doch ich werde Euch weiterhin als Bedrohung ansehen. Und ich werde auch nicht ängstlich vor Euch erzittern."
languages.original_text: "You forced your way onto a closed station and slew one of its Keepers! Felek may have been a traitor, but he was also a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} of House Orsellio. And now you are attempting to threaten me as well?" {n}The old man tilts his head, looking at you mistrustfully.{/n} "While your name and intentions remain unknown to me, I will continue to view you as a threat. And I will not tremble in fear before you either."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid in eine geschlossene Station eingedrungen und habt einen ihrer Hüter getötet! Felek mag ein Verräter gewesen sein, aber er war auch ein {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} des Hauses Orsellio. Und nun wollt Ihr auch noch mich bedrohen?" {n}Der alte Mann legt den Kopf schief und blickt dich misstrauisch an.{/n} "Euer Name und Eure Absichten sind mir noch immer unbekannt, doch ich werde Euch weiterhin als Bedrohung ansehen. Und ich werde auch nicht ängstlich vor Euch erzittern."

languages.text: « Vous avez forcé l'entrée d'une station fermée et tué l'un de ses gardiens ! Felek était peut-être un traître, mais c'était également un {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g} de la maison Orsellio. Et maintenant, vous me menacez à mon tour ? {n}demande-t-il en inclinant la tête d'un air méfiant.{/n} Tant que votre nom et vos intentions me resteront inconnus, je continuerai à vous considérer comme une menace. Et ne comptez pas sur moi pour trembler de peur face à vous. »
languages.original_text: "You forced your way onto a closed station and slew one of its Keepers! Felek may have been a traitor, but he was also a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} of House Orsellio. And now you are attempting to threaten me as well?" {n}The old man tilts his head, looking at you mistrustfully.{/n} "While your name and intentions remain unknown to me, I will continue to view you as a threat. And I will not tremble in fear before you either."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez forcé l'entrée d'une station fermée et tué l'un de ses gardiens ! Felek était peut-être un traître, mais c'était également un {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g} de la maison Orsellio. Et maintenant, vous me menacez à mon tour ? {n}demande-t-il en inclinant la tête d'un air méfiant.{/n} Tant que votre nom et vos intentions me resteront inconnus, je continuerai à vous considérer comme une menace. Et ne comptez pas sur moi pour trembler de peur face à vous. »

languages.text: "Kapalı bir istasyona zorla girdin ve Sorumlularından birini öldürdün! Felek hain olabilir ancak aynı zamanda Orsellio Hanesi'nin hizmetindeki bir {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g} idi. Şimdi de beni mi tehdit etmeye yelteniyorsun?" {n}İhtiyar adam, başını yana eğip sana güvensizce bakıyor.{/n} "İsmin ve niyetin benim için hâlen bir bilinmez olsa da seni tehdit olarak görmeye devam edeceğim. Karşında korkuya kapılıp pusmamı bekleme."
languages.original_text: "You forced your way onto a closed station and slew one of its Keepers! Felek may have been a traitor, but he was also a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} of House Orsellio. And now you are attempting to threaten me as well?" {n}The old man tilts his head, looking at you mistrustfully.{/n} "While your name and intentions remain unknown to me, I will continue to view you as a threat. And I will not tremble in fear before you either."
